seed_pair.known: She wants to find out what the answer is.
seed_pair.target: Ella quiere descubrir cuál es la respuesta.

curation_metadata.curated_by: Claude Code - Phase 5 v3.0 STRICT GATE compliance
curation_metadata.gate_compliance_note: Regenerated with strict GATE compliance - only exact Spanish forms taught in LEGOs through S0016

practice_phrases: I want to speak with her tomorrow
I'm going to try with her

voy a practicar hablar español con ella lo más frecuentemente posible
S0017L01.full_seed_included: NO - missing 'wants', 'to find out', 'what the answer is'
S0017L01.gate_compliance: STRICT - Only exact forms from S0001-S0016 LEGOs. Note: 'ella' used as object pronoun 'her' in prepositional phrases (con ella)
